channel.title: Meta on Simba Tango
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Simba Tango

item.title: Moving
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: Here is a short meta update. The time for moving has come, both physically and technologywise. In a few months I will be moving back to my hometown, which happens to have a vibrant tango community. Looking forward to that. I do have some ideas for posts, but what little time I have for tango at the moment is spent actually dancing and djing. Also, this blog has moved, for a variety of reasons.
